information:
Chris Stapleton received six nominations for the 60th Academy of Country Music Awards. His nominations are for Male Artist of the Year, Entertainer of the Year, Album of the Year, Single of the Year, Music Event of the Year (with Carly Pearce), and Visual Media of the Year. Other top nominees include Ella Langley with eight nominations, and Cody Johnson and Morgan Wallen, who are tied with seven nominations each. Lainey Wilson also received six nominations.

Chris Stapleton has a history of success at industry awards. He has won 19 ACM Awards and 19 CMA Awards throughout his career. In November 2024, at the CMA Awards, he won four awards, including single and song of the year for 'White Horse' and was named male vocalist of the year for a record-extending eighth time. In February 2025, he won his 11th career Grammy Award for Best Country Solo Performance for the song 'It Takes A Woman'.

The 60th Academy of Country Music Awards are scheduled to take place on May 8, 2025, streaming live from the Ford Center at The Star in Frisco, Texas. Reba McEntire will host the event for the 18th time. The lineup of performers announced for the ceremony includes Chris Stapleton and Dua Lipa.

forecast.no_outcome_scenario: Despite six nominations, strong competition from other top nominees like Morgan Wallen, Cody Johnson, and Lainey Wilson leads to them sweeping the major categories, resulting in Chris Stapleton not winning any awards.
forecast.yes_outcome_scenario: Chris Stapleton's critical acclaim and industry respect translate into a win in at least one of the six categories for which he is nominated, such as Male Artist of the Year or Album of the Year.
forecast.rationale: My forecast is based on Chris Stapleton's consistent history of success and his current momentum. The status quo is that Stapleton, a 19-time ACM award winner, wins when nominated. He has six nominations, providing multiple opportunities for a victory. His recent wins at the November 2024 CMA Awards (four awards, including a record eighth Male Vocalist of the Year) and the February 2025 Grammy Awards (Best Country Solo Performance) demonstrate that his latest work is highly regarded by industry voters. While winning is the most likely outcome, the probability is not higher because the field of nominees is exceptionally strong, with artists like Morgan Wallen, Cody Johnson, and Lainey Wilson also having six or more nominations. A 'sweep' by another artist, while unlikely, is possible and prevents a forecast closer to 100%. The forecast is not lower because being shut out across six different categories is a very low-probability event for an artist of Stapleton's stature and proven track record. I would increase my forecast if key competitors were announced to be performing without new music, and I would decrease it if a strong, consensus narrative emerged around another artist deserving to 'sweep' the awards.

prompt:
You are a professional forecaster interviewing for a job.

Your interview question is:
Will Chris Stapleton win an award at the 60th Academy of Country Music Awards?

Question background:
The awards are scheduled to be held on May 8, 2025. Stapleton has 5 nominations.


This question's outcome will be determined by the specific criteria below. These criteria have not yet been satisfied:
This question resolves as **Yes** if Chris Stapleton wins an award at the [60th Academy of Country Music Awards](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/60th_Academy_of_Country_Music_Awards).




Your research assistant's report says:
Chris Stapleton received six nominations for the 60th Academy of Country Music Awards. His nominations are for Male Artist of the Year, Entertainer of the Year, Album of the Year, Single of the Year, Music Event of the Year (with Carly Pearce), and Visual Media of the Year. Other top nominees include Ella Langley with eight nominations, and Cody Johnson and Morgan Wallen, who are tied with seven nominations each. Lainey Wilson also received six nominations.

Chris Stapleton has a history of success at industry awards. He has won 19 ACM Awards and 19 CMA Awards throughout his career. In November 2024, at the CMA Awards, he won four awards, including single and song of the year for 'White Horse' and was named male vocalist of the year for a record-extending eighth time. In February 2025, he won his 11th career Grammy Award for Best Country Solo Performance for the song 'It Takes A Woman'.

The 60th Academy of Country Music Awards are scheduled to take place on May 8, 2025, streaming live from the Ford Center at The Star in Frisco, Texas. Reba McEntire will host the event for the 18th time. The lineup of performers announced for the ceremony includes Chris Stapleton and Dua Lipa.

Today is 2025-04-22.

Before answering you think:
(a) The time left until the outcome to the question is known.
(b) The status quo outcome if nothing changed.
(c) A brief description of a scenario that results in a No outcome.
(d) A brief description of a scenario that results in a Yes outcome.
(e) You write your rationale remembering that good forecasters put extra weight on the status quo outcome since the world changes slowly most of the time. Explain your reasoning and the evidence behind your forecast in detail. Summarise information your received from your research assistant that influences your forecast (if any). Explain why your forecast is not higher, and why it is not lower. Outline what would need to be true for you to update your forecast in either direction.
(f) The last thing you write is your final probabilistic forecast as a number between 0 and 100.

# OUTPUT SCHEMA
{
    "time_left_until_outcome_known": "string",
    "status_quo_outcome": "string",
    "no_outcome_scenario": "string",
    "yes_outcome_scenario": "string",
    "rationale": "string",
    "probability": "number" (0-100)
}
